info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 21 at 12:54PM CDT until April 21 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Cameron.
* WHEN...Until 245 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1254 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Harlingen, Rio Hondo, Palm Valley, Primera, Combes, Harlingen Arts And Heritage Museum, Texas State Technical College Harlingen, Marine Military Academy, Harlingen Fire Department, Harlingen High School, Valley International Airport, Harlingen Public Library, Harlingen Soccer Complex, Mccullough Park, Treasure Hills Golf Club, Treasure Hills Elementary School, Valley Baptist Medical Center Harlingen, Lamar Elementary School, Harlingen Medical Center and Harligen Municipal Golf Course. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
